code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

TagsResource.description: A container holding only the Tags for a resource, allowing the user to update the tags.

Kind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

email.description: The email of this security contact

phone.description: The phone number of this security contact

values.description: Don't get notifications on new alerts

alertNotifications.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to the security contact

values.description: Send notification on new alerts to the subscription's admins
Don't send notification on new alerts to the subscription's admins

alertsToAdmins.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to subscription admins

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

Pricing.description: Pricing tier will be applied for the scope based on the resource ID

values.description: Get free Azure security center experience with basic security features
Get the standard Azure security center experience with advanced security features

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

WorkspaceSetting.description: Configures where to store the OMS agent data for workspaces under a scope

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

workspaceResourceId.description: The full Azure ID of the workspace to save the data in

workspaceCustomerId.description: the customer id associate with the workspace

enabled.description: Is the solution Enabled for the customer.

export.description: Wether to save the raw events to the given workspace.

workspaceId.description: The full Azure ID of the workspace to save the data in

scope.description: All the VMs in this scope will send their security data to the mentioned workspace unless overridden by a setting with more specific scope

AutoProvisioningSettingList.description: List of all the auto provisioning settings response

value.description: List of all the auto provisioning settings

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

AutoProvisioningSettingProperties.description: describes properties of an auto provisioning setting

autoProvision.description: Describes what kind of security agent provisioning action to take

values.description: Install missing security agent on VMs automatically
Do not install security agent on the VMs automatically

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

ComplianceProperties.description: The Compliance score (percentage) of a Subscription is a sum of all Resources' Compliances under the given Subscription. A Resource Compliance is defined as the compliant ('healthy') Policy Definitions out of all Policy Definitions applicable to a given resource.

assessmentTimestampUtcDate.description: The timestamp when the Compliance calculation was conducted.

resourceCount.description: The resource count of the given subscription for which the Compliance calculation was conducted (needed for Management Group Compliance calculation).

assessmentResult.description: An array of segment, which is the actually the compliance assessment.

ComplianceSegment.description: A segment of a compliance assessment.

segmentType.description: The segment type, e.g. compliant, non-compliance, insufficient coverage, N/A, etc.

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether Advanced Threat Protection is enabled.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

Setting.description: Represents a security setting in Azure Security Center.

SettingResource.description: The kind of the security setting

kind.description: the kind of the settings string (DataExportSetting)

enabled.description: Is the data export setting is enabled

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

InformationProtectionPolicyProperties.description: describes properties of an information protection policy.

lastModifiedUtc.description: Describes the last UTC time the policy was modified.

displayName.description: The name of the sensitivity label.

order.description: The order of the sensitivity label.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the label is enabled or not.

displayName.description: The name of the information type.

order.description: The order of the information type.

recommendedLabelId.description: The recommended label id to be associated with this information type.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the information type is enabled or not.

custom.description: Indicates whether the information type is custom or not.
Indicates whether the keyword is custom or not.

canBeNumeric.description: Indicates whether the keyword can be applied on numeric types or not.

excluded.description: Indicates whether the keyword is excluded or not.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

Scope.name: scope
Scope.description: Scope of the query, can be subscription (/subscriptions/0b06d9ea-afe6-4779-bd59-30e5c2d9d13f) or management group (/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/mgName).

SecurityContactName.name: securityContactName
SecurityContactName.description: Name of the security contact object

InformationProtectionPolicyName.name: informationProtectionPolicyName
InformationProtectionPolicyName.description: Name of the information protection policy.

FilterParam.name: $filter
FilterParam.description: filter the Security Solution with OData syntax. supporting filter by iotHubs
